column2: "Yo, <%me>. Have you seen Echo? If you run into her, contact me."
"What happened? The same thing that always happens. Echo gets mad at me for some reason and runs off on her own."
"If I don't look after her, no one else will. It's a pain running after her every time, though..."
"I need to get back to looking for her. See you later, <%me>."
